Package com.myPack

Class PlayOnBoard

java.lang.Object
com.myPack.Board
com.myPack.PlayOnBoard
public class PlayOnBoard
extends Board
This class is a subclass of the Board class. It contains the methods of the game and instances of other classes and it is the only connection between the Classes of the program.

      Returns:
      true or false

    • printTheGame

      public void printTheGame()
      This method will build an instance of the Print Class. And will print the game for us.

    • putABall

      public boolean putABall​(int part, int house)
      This method will put a ball in the board.
      Parameters:
      part - the number of the part
      house - the house in that part

    • rotateBoard

      public boolean rotateBoard​(int part, int type)
      This method will rotate a part for us.
      Parameters:
      part - the number of the part
      type - clockwise or counter clockwise

    • checkPass

      public boolean checkPass()
      This method is for checking if one part of the board have this situation that with rotation it will not change. If yes then we let the user to pass the rotation.
      Returns:
      true or false

    • computerPlay

      public void computerPlay()
      This is for single player mode , it is used for computer to play against you.
